channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT

item.title: Report E-2024080659
item.description:
Report E-2024080659

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-24
  • City: BUTTE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-UBU contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 1-cup of "SPEC-AID 8Q202" from a 250gla metal tote impacting the top face of said tote, for an unknown cause. ERTS dispatched Hanser's Environmental to assist with the release. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted the top of the tote and estimated that one (1) cup of material was released due to the threads on the lid being completely worn out. Hanser's Environmental personnel neutralized and then cleaned the released material. The spent baking soda and recovered material were placed into one (1) 35-gallon poly drum for disposal

item.title: Report E-2024080593
item.description:
Report E-2024080593

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-24

  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 1-quart of "Embreak 2112" released from a metal tote impacting the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable handling the material with terminal-issued PPE available onsite.
